question: Ambulatory patients after a Disaster are categorized into ____ colour of Triage:
exp: Triage - Disaster categorization of victims 1. Red - Immediate Resuscitation 2. Yellow - possible resuscitation 3. Green - Minor injuries (Ambulatory) 4. Black - Dead/ moribund patient

question: MC disease in Post-disaster phase is:-
exp: Post disaster phase: M/C disease - Typhoid/Cholera M/C vitamin deficiency - Vit A, Vit B3, Vit C, Iron Vaccination to be given - None (contraindicated); Except - Measles vaccine Most impoant preliminary step - chlorination of water.
